import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; @Component({ selector: 'app-interpo', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule], templateUrl: './interpo.component.html', styleUrls: ['./interpo.component.css'] }) export class InterpoComponent { value:any add(value:any) { this.value = value } }
{{ value ? value : 'There is no data' }}
